body:
### Package

* **Name**: feh
* **Description**: feh is an X11 image viewer aimed mostly at console users. Unlike most other viewers, it does not have a fancy GUI, but simply displays images. It is controlled via commandline arguments and configurable key/mouse actions.

### Supporting Packages
* **imlib2**: Library that does image file loading and saving as well as rendering, manipulation, arbitrary polygon support
* **libexif**: A library to parse an EXIF file and read the data from those tags
* **libid3tag**: library for id3 tagging

---
If need be I can resubmit this as 4 separate Pull Requests but as the 3 extra packages are just to support the topic of this PR (feh), I decided to submit one request that includes all 4 packages.
title: Add New package feh and supporting packages
